div.sent: We know that we need some help to make our life beautiful.
We need food to live.
We need education to become good human beings.
We need treatment if we are sick.
We need many types of assistance to lead a healthy life.
These are called rights.
We get all these from our family, society and state.
We get these rights from our families.
All that our parents do for us are their duties.
So, we have some duties when we enjoy such rights.
Duty is what we do for others.
We are children.
Slowly we will grow up.
We will make ourselves good human beings.
We will work for the good of our family, society and country.
For this we need to build up career in a nice way.
We need some help to build up our career properly.
These called rights of all children.
We have learnt about some rights of children.
These are very useful to build up our career.
All the children of our society have got equal rights.
We will learn about the rights of children and let other children know about them.
Now we shall draw a table below in our exercise book.
We shall write down five rights of child in it.
We are born in the family.
We grow up in the family.
Our parents give us food and treatment for our good wealth.
These are necessary for us to live.
Besides, our parents love us.
They make arrangements for our education.
They take care of our study.
We get our name from the family.
We are known by these names in society.
Family plays a great role in building up our character.
These help us to build up our career nicely.
Our right is to get all these from the family.
A family may have both boys and girls.
Both boys and girls have equal rights in the family.
It is the duty of parents to give equal opportunities to both and girls.
Children are different from their elders respect of their choice, likes, dislikes and thoughts.
So the needs and rights of children should be taken care of.
We have learnt about the rights of children in the family.
Besides the family, we have some rights to our schools.
It is our greatest right to get education in school.
All children regardless of rich, poor, religion have this right.
We know that to have our rights, we must do our duties.
We have learnt earlier that duty is the work that we do for others.
We have many rights in the family and school.
So we have some duties too to do.
Besides family and school, we have also some duties to society.
There are many kinds of people in society.
Our main duty is to live with all.
We will be hospitable to our neighbours when they visit our home.
Besides, we will be kind to the poor and helpless.
We are the citizens of Bangladesh.
Usually citizens are thoise who live permanently in a country.
For example, we are born in Bangladesh and also live in this country.
So, we are all citizens of Bangladesh.
We get these opportunities from family, school and society.
As citizens we have also some rights to our state.
We will know about some rights as citizens from the table below.
These rights are very important in the life of a citizen.
It is the duty of the state to ensure these rights.
We cannot simply have these rights as citizens.
We have some also duties to the state.
There are many organizations to ensure the rights of citizens.
There are some members also.
All of them are elected by the people of the union .
In cities there are city corporations.
Each city has a chairman and a few members.
The members of the city-corporation are called commissioners.
We will know about who are the voters.
So the persons who are eighteen must become voters.
They should cast votes in elections.
So we can see that we are the members of a family and society.
We also have various rights as citizens of a country.
We do some duties and in exchange of these duties we enjoy some rights.
We are all human beings.
We live in different countries of the world.
The right to live well as human beings is called human rights.
The United Nations has made a declaration on human rights.
All countries obey this declaration.
This declaration has stated rights for the thoughts, actions, religions, security of every human being.
AIL people regardless of male, female, religion and caste will enjoy these rights equally.
According to this declaration people cannot be oppressed and suppressed.
Many organizations work for human rights.
The Amnesty International is a remarkable one.
It works for the rights of the people of all countries.
Legal Aid Centre Adhikar are other human rights organizations of our country.
All the countries of the world observe Human Rights Day on 10th of December.
